errors.error_description: Python version compatibility error - states support for Python 2.7 which is deprecated and incompatible with the actual requirement of Python 3.6+
correction_candidates: Written in Python with support for Python 3.6 and above in versions 20.x.y and beyond.
Written in Python with support for Python 3.8 and above in versions 20.x.y and beyond.
Written in Python with support for Python 3.0 and above in versions 20.x.y and beyond.
Written in Python with support for Python 3.9 and above in versions 20.x.y and beyond.
errors.golden_answer: Written in Python with support for Python 3.6 and above in versions 20.x.y and beyond.

errors.error_description: Incorrect pip command using pip2 instead of pip3 for Python 3 installation
